title: Physical Education in School
banerDescription: Gain qualifications to teach physical education, developing your pedagogical competencies and practical skills.
description:
• Teachers wishing to obtain qualifications to teach physical education
  • Individuals interested in physical activity and sports education
  • Specialists wanting to expand their competencies in physical education
description2: The primary goal of the postgraduate program in physical education is to provide highly effective education, enhance qualifications, and develop practical skills that will excellently prepare participants for the profession of a physical education teacher.
description3: The program is unique and designed to enable quick and effective acquisition of knowledge and skills that will significantly increase competitiveness in the job market. Through engaging lectures, fascinating classes, and inspiring workshops, participants will have the opportunity to acquire valuable education that will contribute to enhancing their professional competencies.
description4: The postgraduate studies prepare for conducting physical education classes at various educational levels and provide the necessary qualifications for effective knowledge transfer and conducting physical activities.

topics.title: Basics of School Tourism and Recreation
Psychomotor Development of School Children and Youth
Theory of Physical Education with Elements of Physical Culture

faculty: Classes are conducted by experienced practitioners and specialists in the field of physical education, sports, and didactics.
practices:
• The internship allows gaining experience in teaching physical education.
  • Internships can be carried out in primary and secondary schools.
evaluation: The assessment of learning outcomes is based on activity during classes, completion of individual modules, implementation of internships, and preparation of a diploma thesis.
jobOpportunities:
Graduates of the program will be prepared to work as:

  • Physical education teachers in primary and secondary schools
  • Sports coaches and instructors
  • Health education and physical activity promotion specialists
  • Sports and recreation animators
  • Employees of institutions dealing with physical culture and sports
invite: Gain the qualifications and skills necessary to teach physical education and inspire students to lead an active and healthy lifestyle.
